comments.body: Changing an actively-used MethodAction's `id` is a breaking change. To do so safely, follow [Zero Downtime](https://www.notion.so/gathertown/Zero-Downtime-Changes-in-V2-1b4bc7eac3d1808f96eec80ea2ce2369?#1b4bc7eac3d180ce94dfc059cab04489) protocol: first create the new MethodAction, migrate all callsites over, then delete the old one once all or enough clients have updated.
